scripts.install: cp -r node_modules/algoliasearch node_modules/bootstrap node_modules/bootstrap-table node_modules/@fortawesome node_modules/instantsearch.js node_modules/jquery node_modules/luxon/build/global/luxon.min.js assets/ && wget https://github.com/scratchblocks/scratchblocks/releases/download/v3.5.2/scratchblocks-v3.5.2-min.js -O assets/scratchblocks.min.js && wget https://github.com/scratchblocks/scratchblocks/releases/download/v3.5.2/scratchblocks-v3.5.2-min.js.map -O assets/scratchblocks.min.js.map && cp -r node_modules/bootstrap _sass/ && rougify style igorpro > _sass/rouge.scss
scripts.preinstall: rm -rf assets/algoliasearch assets/bootstrap assets/bootstrap-table assets/@fortawesome assets/instantsearch.js assets/jquery assets/luxon.min.js assets/scratchblocks.min.js assets/scratchblocks.min.js.map _sass/rouge.scss
